name: Tetley Orange Pekoe
description: Since 1837, the experts at Tetley have painstakingly chosen and carefully blended Orange Pekoe leaves from around the world to give you the delicious taste of Tetley.

name: Tetley Orange Pekoe Decaffeinated
description: Savour the aroma of Tetley’s Decaffeinated Orange Pekoe Tea.  The leaves are decaffeinated right after being picked, then blended by our experts, for the finest cup of tea.

name: Tetley Bold
description: Experience the deep and robust flavour of Tetley Bold, a rich and sparkling golden tea.  Tetley Bold tea leaves are harvested from the highest altitudes of Mount Kenya and blended with North India’s teas to create a spirited, intensely rich flavour that’s bold yet smooth.

name: Tetley Pure Ceylon Tea
description: Enjoy the distinctive, crisp taste of Tetley Pure Ceylon.   Blended using only teas from the island of Sri Lanka, Tetley Pure Ceylon leverages all our 175 years of tea expertise to create this delicious, refreshing blend. This blend is 100% Rainforest alliance Certified Tea.

name: Tetley English Breakfast Tea
description: Discover the rich, complex taste of Tetley English Breakfast.  Blended from premium, full bodied black teas from Africa and India, Tetley English Breakfast leverages all our 175 years of tea expertise to create this sophisticated and invigorating blend of tea.

name: Tetley Chai
description: Taste the exotic with the deliciously balanced flavours of cinnamon, cardamom, ginger, star anise and cloves. Inspired by the traditional Indian Chai, this flavourful and aromatic adventure is sure to soothe and delight.

name: Tetley Earl Grey
description: The flavour of bergamot, combined with our delicious Orange Pekoe base, creates a distinctive regal taste experience.

name: Tetley Decaffeinated Earl Grey
description: We removed the caffeine in our classic Orange Pekoe blend and then combined it with the flavour of bergamot. The result is a delightful, full-bodied regal flavour that you can enjoy cup after delicious cup.

name: Tetley Pure Green Tea
description: Savour the timeless taste of Tetley Pure Green Tea. Produced in the Chinese tradition, the green tea leaves are gently and carefully pan-fired and then rolled to provide the tea’s exquisite flavour and enticing, pale green hue. Pure Green tea - 100% Pure and natural.

name: Tetley Naturally Decaffeinated Green Tea
description: Enjoy all the lovely, smooth flavour of green tea without the caffeine. Sip after sip, Tetley Naturally Decaffeinated Green Tea is sure to transform you into a state of tranquility.

name: Tetley Lemon Green Tea
description: Enjoy all the goodness of pure green tea with the added refreshing and zesty flavour of lemon.

name: Tetley Blueberry Green Tea
description: Real blueberry skins give this green tea its distinctive all-natural flavour and colour.  Fragrant, gentle and sweet, the combination of green tea and blueberry is hard to resist.

name: Tetley Earl Grey Green Tea
description: We’ve combined the irresistibly light flavour of green tea, with the bold and distinctive flavour of bergamot. The result is an unmistakable tea that is refreshing, regal and sure to please your palate.

name: Tetley Honey Lemon Ginseng Green Tea
description: Savour a medley of delicious flavours: the tantalizing taste of green tea, the zesty zing of lemons, and the hint of sweet honey plus ginseng. The result is a tea that’s light and refreshing. Feel free to garnish with a wedge of fresh lemon and serve.

name: Tetley Jasmine Green Tea
description: Revel in the aroma of green tea blended with sweet jasmine flowers. Smooth and sophisticated, Tetley Jasmine Green Tea delights your taste buds with every unforgettable sip.

name: Tetley Decaffeinated Lychee Pear Green Tea
description: Our latest naturally decaffeinated Tetley Green Tea blend offers you the sweet and fragrant combination of two delectable fruits: lychee and pear. Enjoy the pure and natural flavour that comes from lychee blended with green tea and pear flavour.

name: Tetley Mint Green Tea
description: We've married the sophisticated flavour of green with the buoyant taste of mint. The result is a tea that's exquisitely refreshing. An excellent drink at any time, Tetley Mint Green Tea is especially superb right after meals. You'll delight in the delicious flavour with every single sip.

name: Tetley Pomegranate Green Tea
description: Be entranced by the sweet aroma of Tetley Pomegranate Green Tea. Every sip begins with the bold flavour of pomegranate and finishes with the delicious and distinctive taste of green.

name: Tetley Mango Passionfruit Acai Green Tea
description: This unique blend delicately balances three exotic flavours from around teh world with the light and refreshing taste of green tea.  Mango and passionfruit provide a fresh, fruity flavuor while acai, the new superfruit, adds a hint of berry and surprisingly, chocolate. A blend this enticing makes you forget that green tea is good for you too.

name: Tetley Green Tea Plus Aware
description: Bring Focus to your day with a fruity blend of green tea plus blackcurrent, ginseng, guarana, and matcha.

name: Tetley Green Tea Plus Figure
description: Start your day off in tip top shape with a spicy blend of green tea plus cinnamon, orange peel, ginger and matcha.

name: Tetley Green Tea Plus Glow
description: Feel radiant with a refreshing blend of green tea plus grapefruit, aloe vera and hibiscus.

name: Tetley 100% Steamed Pure Green
description: Enjoy Tetley's 100% Steamed Pure Green tea that is pure calm in a cup.  Delicate and balanced.   Unlike other green teas, our leaves have been steamed rather than roasted for a lighter and more refreshing taste.

name: Tetley 100% Steamed Green Tea with Lemon
description: Delight in this refreshing blend of delicate 100% Steamed Green tea with lemon. A declicious combination designed to please.

name: Tetley 100% Steamed Green Tea with Ginger
description: A soothing blend of our light and refreshing 100% Steamed Green Tea with a hint of ginger.
